meanings.definition: The act or process of alternating.
meanings.sent1: The alternations between day and night are constant.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the alternations of the seasons throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The alternations in the weather kept everyone guessing.
meanings.sent4: Her mood showed quick alternations, like a flickering light.
meanings.sent5: The alternations in the music tempo created a dynamic performance.

meanings.definition: A change or variation in form, appearance, quality, or nature.
meanings.sent1: The alternations in the landscape were breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The alternations in the recipe made it more interesting.
meanings.sent3: The alternations in the painting added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent4: The alternations in her hairstyle reflected her evolving style.
meanings.sent5: The alternations in the fabric texture gave it a unique feel.

meanings.definition: A different or second choice or possibility.
meanings.sent1: He considered the alternations before making a decision.
meanings.sent2: The alternations in the menu offered more options.
meanings.sent3: Her alternations in outfit choices always surprised us.
meanings.sent4: The alternations in routes gave us different views of the city.
meanings.sent5: The alternations in plans kept things exciting and flexible.
